products.name: CAMILLA | SO SAYS THE ORACLE V-NECK SCOOP BACK HEM JERSEY DRESS
products.description: The So Says The Oracle V-Neck Scoop Back Hem Jersey Dress by Camilla emulates iconic vintage tattoo motifs in rich golden tones amongst a deep onyx backdrop. Bella Frock loves this luxury jersey dress features a relaxed body with a mini-length hemline at the front and a dramatically longer hemline at the back. The 3/4 batwing sleeves add a luscious volume of soft draping to the silhouette.

products.name: CAMILLA | SEW YESTERDAY WIDE SLEEVE GATHERED DRESS
products.description: The Sew Yesterday Wide Sleeve Gathered Dress by Camilla wanders through a luscious garden of beautiful blooms adorned with delicate gold chains and captivating jewels. This luxury silk maxi dress features a relaxed full-length silhouette with a cascade of tiered panels throughout the drop waistline and flared skirt. The poetic billow of this dress is complemented by flared raglan sleeves finished with elegant ruffled hems.

comments.content: These jeans are super comfortable. Great quality!
Absolutely love this dress! Perfect fit.

products.name: FREE PEOPLE | CALLA LILLY DRESS IN SANDSTONE
products.description: So effortlessly easy, the Calla Lilly Dress in Sandstone by Free People is a laidback maxi, featured in a shapeless silhouette and sleeveless design with a dropped waist and billowy bottom skirt. Bella Frock loves that this versatile maxi can be layered up or down and worn for every season.

comments.content: Nice t-shirt, very soft and breathable fabric.
The jacket looks even better in person. Highly recommend!

products.name: CAMILLA | DREAMING IN DUTCH FLARED SLEEVE DRESS
products.description: The Dreaming In Dutch Flared Sleeve Dress by Camilla wanders through a mint green realm of delicate art nouveau swirls and soft painterly blooms. This luxury silk maxi dress features a slightly blousy bustline that tapers into the adjustable shaped waistband.Bella Frock loves the full-length skirt that flares out into a flowy silhouette that dances at the ankles while the dramatic long sleeves create a captivating flare.

comments.content: Great fit and style. Will buy again.
The sweater is really cozy and warm. Love it!

products.name: CAMILLA | MAGIC IN THE MANUSCRIPTS TIERED DRESS WITH COLLAR
products.description: The Magic In The Manuscripts Tiered Dress With Collar by Camilla embodies a world of bold red and soft pink florals dancing amongst golden filigree against a rich ebony backdrop. This luxury silk mini-shirt dress features a relaxed a-line silhouette with a drop waist seam that flows into a tiered panelled skirt finished with a ruffle hemline.Bella Frock loves the flared long sleeves that echo the tiered ruffle line accent with a wide ruffle that starts at half sleeve length.

comments.content: Not what I expected. The color is a bit off.

products.name: CAMILLA | ETCHED INTO ETERNITY DROP SLEEVE SHIRT DRESS
products.description: The Etched Into Eternity Drop Sleeve Shirt Dress by Camilla embodies a vivid arrangement of luscious florals dancing amongst a cascade of intricate filigree against a soft blush-toned background. Bella Frock loves that this CAMILLA silk shirt dress features a relaxed slightly a-line silhouette with the option of a waist tie to cinch and shape. The flared silhouette of this luxury silk shirt dress is accentuated with a ruffle hem detail which compliments the full-length blouson sleeves that taper into button-up cuffs.

comments.content: Not what I expected. The color is a bit off.

products.name: SACHA DRAKE | BLACK SWEATHEARTS COCKTAIL DRESS
products.description: Evoking old Hollywood glamour, through the hourglass silhouette, sequin encrusted mesh, and sweet-heart neckline, the Sweethearts Ruched Cocktail Dress in Black by Sacha Drake is a forever piece you will never tire of. If you are after a little arm coverage, we, at Bella Frock, love pairing this dress with its matching Midnight Bolero. Pair with gold accessories for cocktail parties, evening events, date nights, or any special occasion.

comments.content: Good value for money. Would recommend.

products.name: SACHA DRAKE | SAPPHIRE FLAME WRAP MIDI DRESS
products.description: We, at Bella Frock, can't get enough of the multi-colour floral print on the Sapphire Flame Wrap Midi by Sacha Drake. Crafted from a premium jersey fabrication that is perfect for all-day wear. This dress is great for the office, day events, on the weekends or to take on your next holiday, as the fabric will not crease, just wash and wear! The wrap style offers a flexible fit on the body and the mini collar and cuff detail add a polished look.

products.name: MES DEMOISELLES | MURAY FLOWERS BLOUSE | MOLDA VIE ROSE
products.description: Introducing the Muray Flowers Blouse in Molda Vie Rose by Mes Demoiselles—a versatile and effortlessly chic addition to your wardrobe. Embrace the oversized style of this shirt dress, crafted from double cotton twill, offering both comfort and durability. Whether worn as a simple dress or tucked into trousers to create a quirky blouse, this piece offers endless styling possibilities. Adorned with a striking floral baroque print, the blouse exudes charm and sophistication. Bella Frock loves the wide and supple sleeves that add a touch of elegance, while a drawstring at the neckline allows you to adjust the fit to your liking. From casual outings to more formal occasions, this shirt dress will elevate your look with its unique charm and versatility.

products.name: MES DEMOISELLES | ROSE FOLIA BLACK SHIRT | DELIGHT BLOOMS
products.description: The Rose Folia Black Shirt in Delight Blooms by Mes Demoiselles is a fusion of classic elegance and contemporary flair. This delicate shirt combines the timeless sophistication of fancy jacquard with modern design elements. Adorned with a captivating print along the sleeves and shoulders, it adds a touch of intrigue and charm to the ensemble. Bella Frock loves the straight cut and supple long sleeves that embrace the casual style of the season's must-have shirts, offering comfort and versatility. Whether paired with tailored trousers for a polished look or with denim for a more laid-back vibe, the Rose Folia Black Shirt is sure to make a statement wherever you go.

products.name: MES DEMOISELLES | ARA IMPRIME PANTHER BLOUSE | ANIMAL INSTINCT
products.description: Introducing the Ara Imprine Panther Blouse in Animal Instincts by Mes Demoiselles—a striking blend of untamed allure and refined elegance. Embrace your wild side with this exquisite blouse, featuring a stunning combination of animal-inspired motifs and intricate tie-dye patterns on luxurious satin viscose fabric. Bella Frock loves the loose and supple silhouette, it offers comfort and versatility, while the open neckline and long sleeves add a touch of sophistication.

products.name: CAMILLA | DANCE WITH THE DUKE RAGLAN BUTTON UP SHIRT
products.description: The Dance With The Duke Raglan Button Up Shirt by Camilla embodies intricate mosaics of delicate shells pearls and opulent golden flourishes. This luxury CAMILLA silk blouse features a high neckline that falls into a softly gathered relaxed fit body that falls to a curved hemline. Bella Frock loves that the blouson sleeves echo the billowy silhouette that gathers into wide button-up cuffs for a sleek tailored accent.
